page.title: 11 THE LAKE
page.content: When {Askern}was a{Spa}town people used to come to bathe in the lake, as it was supposed to be good for them. The{lake}has an area of just over one hectare and is very deep, being fed by underground springs. The lake used to have bath houses around it. Now they have been knocked down. A cafe and boathouse has been built. This is a list of all the birds on the lake: mallard, coot, mute swan and Aylesbury ducks. Now the lake is mainly used for {fishing}and{boating.}The fish in the lake are perch; pike; tench; roach and carp. There are two islands on the lake where the birds can lay their eggs and feed on insects. At the back of th e lake. There is a BMX track and a golf course. There are benches for people to sit on round the lake.
